articles.author: Jake Peterson
articles.title: Pirating Final Cut Pro Is More Dangerous Than You Think - Lifehacker
articles.description: It's dangerous taking to the high seas, even to get expensive software on the cheap.
articles.content: Most professional software these days has switched to expensive subscription-based models, but not Apple: Final Cut Pro still costs the same $299 it did when the app launched in 2011. Still, three hu… [+3790 chars]
